amendment.description: Amendment provides increased funding for the Small Business Administration's Women's Business Centers Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding to the Small Business Administration by $2,500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Ms. Millender-McDonald.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
